source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(LastModifytime) as NewWatermarkvalue from data_source_table

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from data_source_table where LastModifytime > '@{activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and LastModifytime <= '@{activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

sources.name: Input
sources.description: Source employees file, changes every day

sources.name: DimEmployees
sources.description: Current rows in DimEmployees DW table

transformations.name: NullFilter
transformations.description: Filter out NULLs from source file

scriptLines: NullFilter, select1 lookup(Input@{WWI Customer ID} == select1@{WWI Customer ID},
WWICustomer, CustomerTable lookup(WWICustomer@{WWI Customer ID} == CustomerTable@{WWI Customer ID},
lookup1 filter(!isNull(WWICustomer@{WWI Customer ID}) && !equals(toString({Bill To Customer}),'N/A')) ~> IDnotNull
source1, ForActive exists(source1@{WWI Customer ID} == DimCustomer@{WWI Customer ID},
ForActive, exists1 exists(DimCustomer@{WWI Customer ID} == toInteger(source1@{WWI Customer ID}),
surrogateKey1, ForActive join(source1@{Customer Key} == DimCustomer@{Customer Key},
